original_text: You and Aaron must record the names of all the men in each group who can fight in the army. Record the names of men who are 20 years old or older.
korean_text: 이스라엘 중 이십 세 이상으로 싸움에 나갈 만한 모든 자를 너와 아론은 그 진영별로 계수하되

sentences.original_text: You and Aaron must record the names
of all the men in each group
who can fight in the army
who are 20 years old or older
